scripts.dev:citizen: yarn run build-css-citizen && cd packages/citizen && yarn start
scripts.dev:employee: yarn run build-css-employee && cd packages/employee && set PORT=3006 && yarn start
scripts.prod:citizen: yarn run go_citizen && cd packages/citizen && yarn run build
scripts.prod:employee: yarn run go_employee && cd packages/employee && yarn run build
scripts.transpile-citizen-modules: run-p pgr-citizen pt-citizen egov-noc egov-abg egov-opms egov-hc egov-echallan egov-store-asset egov-nulm
scripts.transpile-common-modules: run-p egov-ui-kit egov-ui-framework egov-workflow egov-tradelicence egov-rented-properties egov-estate egov-uc egov-pt egov-boilerplate egov-common egov-bpa egov-wns egov-pr egov-pms egov-store-asset
scripts.transpile-employee-modules: run-p pgr-employee pt-employee egov-hrms egov-noc egov-abg egov-opms egov-hc egov-echallan egov-nulm
scripts.build-css-common: run-p build-css-egov-ui-kit build-css-egov-ui-framework-core build-css-egov-workflow build-css-egov-tradelicence build-css-egov-rented-properties build-css-egov-estate build-css-egov-uc build-css-egov-pt build-css-egov-noc build-css-egov-opms build-css-egov-hc build-css-egov-boilerplate build-css-egov-common build-css-egov-abg build-css-egov-bpa build-css-egov-wns build-css-egov-pr build-css-egov-pms build-css-egov-echallan build-css-egov-store-asset build-css-egov-nulm
scripts.go: yarn && yarn run build-css-employee && yarn run build-css-citizen && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules && yarn run transpile-citizen-modules && yarn run transpile-employee-modules && lerna bootstrap
scripts.go_employee: yarn && yarn run build-css-employee  && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules  && yarn run transpile-employee-modules && lerna bootstrap  --ignore egov-ui-framework-core --ignore egov-ui-kit-dev --ignore RNativeApp --ignore rainmaker-citizen --ignore pgr-citizen --ignore pt-citizen  --ignore egov-hrms-dev  --ignore egov-tradelicence-dev --ignore egov-rented-properties-dev --ignore egov-estate-dev --ignore egov-uc-dev --ignore egov-pt-dev --ignore egov-workflow-dev --ignore pt-employee-dev --ignore pt-citizen-dev --ignore pgr-employee-dev --ignore pgr-citizen-dev --ignore egov-abg-dev --ignore egov-noc-dev --ignore egov-opms-dev --ignore egov-hc-dev  --ignore egov-pms-dev --ignore egov-echallan-dev  --ignore egov-boilerplate-dev --ignore egov-common-dev --ignore egov-bpa-dev --ignore egov-wns-dev --ignore egov-store-asset-dev --ignore egov-nulm-dev
scripts.go_citizen: yarn  && yarn run build-css-citizen && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules && yarn run transpile-citizen-modules  && lerna bootstrap  --ignore egov-ui-framework-core --ignore egov-ui-kit-dev --ignore RNativeApp --ignore rainmaker-employee --ignore pgr-employee --ignore pt-employee --ignore egov-hrms-dev  --ignore egov-tradelicence-dev --ignore egov-rented-properties-dev --ignore egov-estate-dev --ignore egov-uc-dev --ignore egov-pt-dev --ignore egov-workflow-dev --ignore pt-employee-dev --ignore pt-citizen-dev --ignore pgr-employee-dev --ignore pgr-citizen-dev --ignore egov-abg-dev --ignore egov-noc-dev --ignore egov-opms-dev --ignore egov-hc-dev  --ignore egov-pms-dev  --ignore egov-echallan-dev  --ignore egov-boilerplate-dev --ignore egov-common-dev --ignore egov-bpa-dev --ignore egov-wns-dev --ignore egov-hrms --ignore egov-store-asset-dev --ignore egov-nulm-dev
scripts.go_rp: yarn && yarn run build-css-common-rp && yarn run transpile-common-modules-rp && lerna bootstrap
scripts.build-css-common-rp: run-p build-css-egov-ui-kit build-css-egov-ui-framework-core build-css-egov-workflow build-css-egov-tradelicence build-css-egov-rented-properties
scripts.transpile-common-modules-rp: run-p egov-ui-kit egov-ui-framework egov-workflow egov-tradelicence egov-rented-properties
scripts.go_estate: yarn && yarn run build-css-common-estate && yarn run transpile-common-modules-estate && lerna bootstrap
scripts.go_rp_est: yarn && yarn run build-css-common-rp-est && yarn run transpile-common-modules-rp-est && lerna bootstrap
scripts.build-css-common-rp-est: run-p build-css-egov-ui-kit build-css-egov-ui-framework-core build-css-egov-workflow build-css-egov-tradelicence build-css-egov-rented-properties build-css-egov-estate
scripts.transpile-common-modules-rp-est: run-p egov-ui-kit egov-ui-framework egov-workflow egov-tradelicence egov-rented-properties egov-estate
